author: Dan Chen
title: China’s coronavirus response could build public support for its government
description: There are dissenters, but some citizens feel secure because of the government's covid-19 measures
content: Some analysts believe this health crisis has revived political dissent. They point to new writings by intellectuals like political activist Xu Zhiyong, a legal scholar and civil rights advocate; and Tsinghua University law professor Xu Zhangrun, both of whom … [+6893 chars]
